import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import {LangContext} from "./index"; function Surahs() { const [Data, setData] = useState({}); const [lang]=useContext(LangContext); useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { const res = await fetch("http://104.238.102.6/~yildirim/quran.com/api/chapters/en"); res .json() .then(res => setData(res)) } fetchData(); }); const content = Array.isArray(Data.chapters)?Data.chapters:""; return (
  • All

  • Madini Surahs of Quran 28
